title: If You’ve Been In a Relationship Where You Were Hurt, Listen to This | Relationship Theory
description: In this week’s episode of Relationship Theory,  Tom and Lisa discuss when it’s a good idea to wait to start a relationship. Check out our amazing sponsors!
